_comments.BUFFER_SIZE: Number of audio chunks to combine per recording (e.g., 2 chunks).
_comments.CHUNK_DURATION: Duration in seconds of each audio chunk recorded.
_comments.CHANNELS: Number of audio channels (e.g., microphone configuration).
_comments.MAX_RECORDINGS: Maximum number of recordings to keep (if implementing cleanup).
_comments.LAT: Latitude for BirdNET analysis (set to Austin, Texas).
_comments.LON: Longitude for BirdNET analysis (set to Austin, Texas).
_comments.RECORDINGS_FOLDER: Folder to store recorded WAV files from the audio recording module.
_comments.BIRDNET_DATA_STREAM_FOLDER: Folder to store the ledger CSV and bird images from analysis.
_comments.LEDGER_FILE: Path to the CSV file that records detection results.
_comments.CURRENT_BIRD_IMAGE: Path where the current bird image downloaded from Wikimedia Commons is saved.
